Class Arc<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Arc<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - 

    public class Arc<E>
extends java.lang.Object
    Arc ADT that can hold/modify: source vertex target vertex client data (ie. weight) annotations
    Author:
    Jasmine Ishigami

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Arc(Vertex<E> source, Vertex<E> target)
      Constructs an Arc Object given the source vertex and target vertex.
      Arc(Vertex<E> source, Vertex<E> target, java.lang.Object data)
      Constructs an Arc Object given the source vertex, target vertex, and Object data.
